item.title: Astrobiology
item.description: Föreläsningar: Astronomy 141 Bra grunläggande föreläsningar. “The topics covered in this course lie at the interfaces between astronomy, chemistry, biology, geology, and the earth and planetary sciences.” Länk: http://www.astronomy.ohio-state.edu/~pogge/Ast141/ Litteratur Schrödinger, What is Life?, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/What_Is_Life%3F
